description.p: You embody the grace, strength, and resilience of felines. Eventually, you gain the ability to take the form of a lion or a tiger.

td.em: find familiar (feline only), speak with animals

description.p: When you choose this domain at 1st level, you learn the true strike cantrip and you gain proficiency in Acrobatics and Stealth.

At 2nd level, you can use your Channel Divinity to add a +10 bonus to a single Dexterity ability check or Dexterity-based skill check made by you or someone you designate within 30 feet. Doing this takes no action on your turn or a reaction when it’s not your turn. You make this choice after you see the roll but before the GM says whether the check succeeds or fails.

description.p: Beginning at 6th level, you gain darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision, the range becomes 90 feet.

At 8th level, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 1d8 damage of the same type dealt by the weapon to the target. When you reach 14th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8.

sheet.description: Once on each of your turns, you can cause a weapon attack to deal an extra 1d8 damage of the same type dealt by the weapon to the target on a hit.
Once on each of your turns, you can cause a weapon attack to deal an extra 2d8 damage of the same type dealt by the weapon to the target on a hit.

description.p: At 17th level, you become a natural lycanthrope. You use the statistics of a weretiger, though your form can be that of a werelion, werepanther, wereleopard, or other large cat, whichever is appropriate for your deity. Your alignment doesn’t change as a result of this lycanthopy, and you can’t spread the disease of lycanthropy.
